title: Where We Left Off With ‘Bridgerton’ Season 1
description:
As ‘Bridgerton’ Season 2 approaches, Juliet and Jodi do a retrospective on first season catching up on where all the story lines left off, discussing how the show might look without Season 1 breakout star Regé-Jean Page, looking forward to the addition of Simone Ashley to the main cast, and much more.
Hosts: Juliet Litman and Jodi Walker
Producer: Sasha Ashall
